meanings.sent1: She skated gracefully on the frozen pond.
meanings.sent2: The children skated around the rink with joy.
meanings.sent3: He skated so fast, he almost flew off the ice!
meanings.sent4: Her words skated effortlessly through the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The figure skater skated as if she were dancing on ice.

meanings.definition: To move or progress smoothly or easily.
meanings.sent1: The project skated to completion ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent2: The boat skated across the calm waters of the lake.
meanings.sent3: The cat skated through the room, avoiding the obstacles.
meanings.sent4: Time skated by as they enjoyed each other's company.
meanings.sent5: The plan skated smoothly into action without any hitches.
